description: A Zen bouldering brush inspired by the Japanese art of calligraphy. The Sumi Brush has long bristles for durability, and a secondary brush for tight spots, and micro edges.Made with biodegradable materials.Tough handle with a textured grip won't snap while attached to your chalk bag.Durable boar's hair bristles.Secondary brush cleans small edges and tight spots.Built-in clip.
name: Flashed Sumi Boar's Hair Brush
